Draw two cards, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you cast In Dire Straits during your turn for its reconstruct cost, create X 3/2 green Horror creature tokens, where X is the number of lands you control.
Reconstruct {8}{G}{G}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]
